 2009-15292009-09-09,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActBank Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Cost of Borrowing (Banks) Regulations
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE COST OF BORROWING (Banks) REGULATIONS to improve the transparency of disclosures, the amendments require that all disclosure under the regulations be made in a manner that is clear, concise and not misleading.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0258 Publication Date: 2009-09-30
